title: 1804 Santa Clara Ave #E - 2 bedroom / 1 bathroom
posting_body: ['1804 Santa Clara Ave #E is a updated 2 bedroom, 1 bath apartment with plenty of natural sunlight.', 'This charming unit features an open floor plan and laminated floor.', 'Updated Kitchen features beautiful backsplash, gleaming stone countertops & island, and stainless steel appliances.', '\xa0 Coin operated laundry on site and 1 assigned carport parking space.', 'Property is professionally managed by CZRE', 'Lease terms: 1 year lease', 'Rent: $2500', 'Security Deposit: $3200', 'Rental fee: One time 30% rental fee paid by tenant', '$6.45/month for 12 months\xa0 Rent Program Fee (Tenant Responsibility)', 'Pets negotiable', 'Tenant pay electric only', '1 carport parking space - #1', 'Coin laundry on-site', 'Contact the CZRE leasing team to schedule a viewing.', 'show contact info', 'Due to the current COVID-19 restrictions and high volume of inquiries, please be patient with us.', 'Please note that our showing schedule is typically Monday-Friday 9am-4pm and weekends by appointment only.', 'To expedite your request, include property address in the subject line with a few dates and times that you are available to preview.', 'We look forward to getting you into this great community.', 'Do not disturb residents.', 'Cerda-Zein Real Estate, Inc is an equal housing opportunity company.', 'Listed by Cerda-Zein Real Estate, Lic #01878914', 'See more rentals at <URL>', 'All information deemed reliable but has not been verified or guaranteed.']
